summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3401 , for the improvement of West 50th Street, from 6th Avenue Northwest to 9th Avenue Northwest, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44760, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
